title: Presented sub-$50K DMV business opportunity (dryer vent service)
summary: Evaluated mobile dryer vent & air-duct cleaning play under $40K capex with revenue/expense model and step-by-step launch plan.
result: Shared breakdown + daily 5 AM cron reminder scheduled for future opportunities.
followUp: Deliver next opportunity at 5 AM ET tomorrow; build spreadsheet if Austin requests.

title: Built public assignment tracker + hosting pipeline
summary: Created static dashboard (summary cards, filters, task log), seeded initial data, and wired GitHub Pages deployment.
result: Site deployed — waiting on first GitHub Pages build to propagate (~2 min).
followUp: Log each future assignment + ping Austin once Pages build finishes.

title: Published refreshed 2008 Mercedes-Benz S550 listing

result: Listing submitted and currently in Facebook review queue.

title: Contacted five qualifying Nissan Altima sellers
summary: Applied ≤$10K / ≤100K mi / ≥2018 filter and messaged five high-potential listings with custom cash offers and availability questions.
result: Waiting on seller replies; inbox monitoring enabled.
followUp: Surface any responsive sellers + coordinate inspections over the weekend.

title: Launched 2014 BMW 528i xDrive Marketplace listing
summary: Drafted copy, uploaded Austin’s media, and cross-posted the 528i listing to Marketplace + owner-for-sale groups with saved quick replies for buyer inquiries.
result: Listing live; monitoring Facebook inbox for qualified leads.
followUp: Refresh hero photos + prep Craigslist/OfferUp cross-post if responses stay quiet.

title: Sourced neutral queen bed frame for furniture refresh
summary: Filtered local Marketplace listings and surfaced a clean-lined upholstered platform frame that matched Austin’s specs (neutral fabric, no tufting).
